text: niṅṅaḷil āreṅkiluṁ taṅṅaḷuṭe bhāryamāre viṭṭēccu keāṇṭ maraṇappeṭukayāṇeṅkil avar (bhāryamār) taṅṅaḷuṭe kāryattil nālumāsavuṁ pattu divasavuṁ kāttirikkēṇṭatāṇ‌. enniṭṭ avaruṭe ā avadhiyettiyāl taṅṅaḷuṭe kāryattilavar maryādayanusaricc pravarttikkunnatil niṅṅaḷkk kuṟṟameānnumilla. niṅṅaḷ pravarttikkunnatellāṁ allāhu sūkṣmamāyi aṟiyunnuṇṭ‌
